Package org.eclipse.imagen

Class ComponentSampleModelJAI

Object
SampleModel
ComponentSampleModel
ComponentSampleModelImageN
ComponentSampleModelJAI
@Deprecated public class ComponentSampleModelJAI extends ComponentSampleModelImageN
Deprecated.
This class is a subclass of ComponentSampleModelImageN to work around serialization issues. It is deprecated and you're not supposed to use it anymore. It is only kept around for backward compatibility. Won't be removed anytime soon, in order to support long term serialization of ImageLayout descriptions.
